name: Knights of Valour 2: New Legend
overview: A horizontally scrolling beatemup that uses Romance of the Three Kingdoms story as a backdrop. Unlike previous entries in the series this title utilized an electronic card based system that saved a players level and items each time they played the game. This game is an update of Knights of Valour 2 that includes new levels, shops, weapons, and enemies.This may be a duplicate entry with Knights of Valour 2 Bushou Retsuden
